recipes.title: Dumb Sandwich
recipes.description: A cheeky, over-the-top sandwich with crispy bread, melted cheese, and a punchy sauce.
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Spread mayonnaise and hot sauce on the unbuttered sides.
Add cheese between the slices, buttered sides out.
Toast in a pan over medium heat until golden and melted.

recipes.title: British Carbonara
recipes.description: A British-leaning twist on carbonara with smoky bacon, peas, and a creamy egg sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente, reserving a splash of pasta water.
Fry bacon until crisp, then add peas to warm through.
Whisk eggs and parmesan with black pepper.
Toss pasta with bacon, remove from heat, then stir in egg mixture and a splash of pasta water.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and pepper.
